english.segment1: I have found exceeding joy. Jesus answered when I called. This Name that has saved me. Pure love that embraced me
english.segment2: Mercy, grace, eternal life. Bought from darkness to His light
english.segment3: While lost in my sin, He. Raised me and made me live
english.segment4: My soul magnifies the Lord. My heart joys in God my Saviour. For He lifts the lowly. He's done great things for me. I will sing, praising evermore. He is mighty and Holy is His Name.
english.segment5: I will lift my head up high. Praising Jesus through each trial. Though I have not seen Him. I love Him completely
